Player History
Was selected to the 1965 Allstar game...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 8/1/1966, going 6-0, 1.71...
Won World Series with San Francisco in 1967...
Hit first career homerun on 5/19/1968, off Jack Billingham (ATL)...
Was selected to the 1968 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by Los Angeles on 2/16/1971 to a 3-year deal worth $3,300,000 per year...
Won World Series with Los Angeles in 1971...
Signed as a free agent by Cleveland on 2/9/1976 to a 3-year deal worth $5,330,000 per year...
